Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and measure non-microbial analyte(s) in human clinical specimens to aid in assessment of patients with suspected sepsis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for B·R·A·H·M·S PCT sensitive KRYPTOR immunofluorescent assay for procalcitonin using TRACE technology to aid assessment of sepsis risk and antibiotic management
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in risk assessment of progression to severe sepsis and septic shock, cumulative 28-day mortality risk, and decision making on antibiotic initiation/discontinuation in patients with suspected or confirmed sepsis or lower respiratory tract infections, when used with clinical assessment
